nodes.text: The Lol system was located in the Outer Rim Territories' Lol sector. It was home to the Sumrias species. Since members of the Sumrian thought-caste had four-fingered hands, the species developed a base-eight measuring system that served as the basis for the development of Df, a parameter characterizing the combat performance of military artillery.

Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, the Lol system was mentioned by Rebel Alliance historian Major Arhul Hextrophon in a compilation of Imperial documents for Alliance Supreme Commander Mon Mothma and other Rebel officers.

The Lol system was introduced in the Imperial Sourcebook, a 1989 supplement written by Greg Gorden for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed it in grid square Q-18.
